thread.title: Ferdinando
thread.title_full: Scent of Sicily reviewed by Ferdinando

author: Ferdinando
title: Ferdinando
text:
Last October me and my girlfriend had a special occasion to celebrate, our anniversary. We decided then to look for something different from a standard hotel experience and doing our research we ended up reading about Scent of Sicily Villa.
The online reviews convinced us to rent the Villa and it couldn't have been a better choice! The weather was just perfect, warm enough to enjoy the massive beach nearby the Villa (just 300 mt, within a few minutes walking distance).
The garden, with a very spacious swimming pool perfect to relax and to take nice swim, was quite large.
The agency was very friendly and careful for any of our needs and the local people were funny and helpful even if their english wasn't always perfect.
Overall, I can definitely say that it was a very good experience that I would recommend to any of my friends who are looking for a discreet and romantic break.
